div.p: WHO Adverse Drug Reaction Terminology (WHOART). Spanish Translation. Uppsala (Sweden): WHO Collaborating Centre for International Drug Monitoring, 1997. For more information, see http://www.umc-products.com/graphics/3149.pdf
